page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: CLUBS THERE ARE MANY CLUBS IN NORTHWICH. SOME CLUBS ARE LARGE SOME ARE SMALL, SOME OF THE CLUBS ARE FOR MEMBERS ENTERTAINMENT.MANY OF THE CLUBS ARE PROPERLY ORGANISED,OTHERS ARE NOT. NORTHWICH VICTORIA FOOTBALL CLUB IS AN ORGANISED CLUB.THEY HAVE A SOCIAL CLUB OUTSIDE THE GROUND.I HAVE COMPARED "VIC'S"WITH ANOTHER CLUB AT WINNINGTON.THERE ARE MANY GAMES AND ACTIVITIES IN THE YOUTH CLUB,IT IS RUN ON A VOLUNTARY BASIS. OUTINGS ARE ORGANISED FOR MEMBERS.THE TWO CLUBS ARE VERY DIFFERENT AND SERVE DIFFERENT PEOPLE.THERE ARE MANY CLUBS IN NORTHWICH WHICH ARE ORGANISED AND RUN BY PEOPLE WITH DIFFERENT INTERESTS.FOR EXAMPLE,NORTHWICH ROWING CLUB HAS BEEN STEADILY GROWING FOR MANY YEARS.IT ENTERS CREWS IN ALL GROUPS AT REGATTAS AND HAS ONE ENGLAND SQUAD MEMBER.
